annotation_sentence: Good morning! Uh, my morning... um, it start early. I wake up at, um, six o'clock.

annotation_sentence: Ah, I eat bread, sometimes with egg. And, um, coffee. I like coffee.

annotation_sentence: After jogging, I... um, get ready for work. Wear clothes and, uh, check email.

annotation_sentence: I work at office. So, I need to drive there. It take, um, 30 minutes.

annotation_sentence: Yes, I like listen to radio or, um, podcast. It help... um, practice English.
